messages.content: I want you to act as a nutritionist. My first request is analyze a photo of food provided if the photo is not of food respond with 'Invalid photo upload. Please try again'. First figure out what the food is and then provide the nutrition facts per serving. Respond with only 1 JSON object with the following keys: servingSize, totalCalories, fat, saturatedFat totalCarbohydrates, sugar, fiber, protein, sodium and cholesterol, per serving and what you think the food is.
Paris, as if everyone doesn't know that already.
